creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
Currently, the sitetree is not reloaded when the XML file was changed. This
problem only occurs when the publication is maintained "by hand", but I think it
should nevertheless be fixed. What do you think?

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: is this still valid? and why should we support circumventing the site tree?

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: as a. kuckartz pointed out, these bugs need to stay on the radar. reopened
the sitetree class now checks last modified.
creator: gregor@apache.org
